item.title: Pastoralism renewal : Côme Mazin-Pietri et Camille de Broissia
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Rendering made for the diploma of Côme Mazin-Pietri and Camille de Broissia The rendering are made using the photographs below. It’s a project made to reinforce the usages of sheep herding along the Loire. I had access to the 3D models, and a broad range of materiality choices.The first one showcases a multi-usage hall.The second […]
item.content:encoded:
Rendering made for the diploma of Côme Mazin-Pietri and Camille de Broissia

The rendering are made using the photographs below. It’s a project made to reinforce the usages of sheep herding along the Loire. I had access to the 3D models, and a broad range of materiality choices.
The first one showcases a multi-usage hall.
The second one showcases a dairy.
The third one displays a cabin for herders.
The final one is made without photo references and shows a spinning mill.
